localised_text.tooltip_text: Clan Contracts||View any current contracts being offered by the four Great Clans.

active.name: active
active.tooltip: Available Scheme||This Scheme can be used to perform [[img:icon_shadowy_dealings]][[/img]]Shadowy Dealings. Schemes become available as you perform Nightlord's Say-So actions to complete Snikch's campaign.

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: Used Scheme||This Scheme has been used to perform [[img:icon_shadowy_dealings]][[/img]]Shadowy Dealings and will reset after the specified number of turns. Schemes become available as you perform Nightlord's Say-So actions to complete Snikch's campaign.

locked.name: locked
locked.tooltip: [[col:red]]Unavailable Scheme||Schemes become available as you perform Nightlord's Say-So actions in [[img:icon_shadowy_dealings]][[/img]]Shadowy Dealings to complete Snikch's campaign.

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.tooltip: Number of turns until next used Scheme resets

complete.name: complete
complete.tooltip: Maximum Schemes||Use Schemes to perform [[img:icon_shadowy_dealings]][[/img]]Shadowy Dealings or increase maximum Schemes by performing Nightlord's Say-So actions to complete Snikch's campaign.
